q1: Why didn't Italy qualify for the world cup?
a1: They faced better teams but they perhaps felt too complacent given their history
q2: Italy performed poorly in qualifying and overestimated themselves.
a2: Do you mean they got cocky?
q3: I think they forgot how to be disciplined and play their system. They have no system right now.
a3: Yes, the Italy team is undisciplined and dysfunctional right now.
q4: What would help make Italy a more disciplined team?
a4: The answer is always: Practice, Practice, Practice!
q5: Do you think Italy will make it to FIFA 2022?
a5: Yes, they'll definitely improve in light of their recent qualification failure.
